citation_details.title: Decoding neural activity to assess individual latent state in ecologically valid contexts
citation_details.author: SM Gordon, JR McDaniel, KW King
citation_details.abstract: Objective. Currently, there exists very few ways to isolate cognitive processes, historically  defined via highly controlled laboratory studies, in more ecologically valid contexts. Specifically
citation_details.short_author: SM Gordon, JR McDaniel, KW King
